entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow near the Ogilvie mountains before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow near the Ogilvie mountains. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
